name: Sergeant Bruckman
Lore: 'Corellian Scout who served as point man for General Solo''s strike team. Recruited by General Madine for the Alliance commando unit.',
Text: 'When opponent has just initiated a battle at same exterior site and all your ability here is provided by scouts, may reveal top card of Reserve Deck. If that card is a scout, may deploy it here for free (otherwise, replace on top of Reserve Deck).',
